      remove this server operation - because accumulo requires scopes as a parameter it is passed into this method, but the server op will be removed entirely regardless of scopes

      • removeServerOp

        public void removeServerOp(String index,
                           String serverOpName,
                           com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope> scopes)
        Description copied from interface: ServerSideOperations
        remove this server operation - because accumulo requires scopes as a parameter it is passed into this method, but the server op will be removed entirely regardless of scopes
        Specified by:
        removeServerOp in interface ServerSideOperations
        Parameters:
        index - the index/table
        serverOpName - the operation name
        scopes - the existing scopes

      • addServerOp

        public void addServerOp(String index,
                        int priority,
                        String name,
                        String operationClass,
                        Map<String,String> properties,
                        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope> configuredScopes)
        Description copied from interface: ServerSideOperations
        add this server operation
        Specified by:
        addServerOp in interface ServerSideOperations
        Parameters:
        index - the index/table
        priority - the operation priority (this is merely relative, it defines how to order multiple operations, from low to high)
        name - the operation name
        operationClass - the operation class
        properties - the operation options
        configuredScopes - the scopes

      • updateServerOp

        public void updateServerOp(String index,
                           int priority,
                           String name,
                           String operationClass,
                           Map<String,String> properties,
                           com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope> currentScopes,
                           com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ServerOpConfig.ServerOpScope> newScopes)
        Description copied from interface: ServerSideOperations
        update this server operation, the current scopes are passed in because accumulo requires iteratorscope as a parameter to remove the iterator. This will update the server op to the new scope.
        Specified by:
        updateServerOp in interface ServerSideOperations
        Parameters:
        index - the index/table
        priority - the operation priority (this is merely relative, it defines how to order multiple operations, from low to high)
        name - the operation name
        operationClass - the operation class
        properties - the operation options
        currentScopes - the existing scopes
        newScopes - the new configured scopes
